name: FancyMisfortune
description:
A romantic cruise in the wild waves of the Mediterranean Ocean becomes a disaster, when various mishappenings keep occuring. Our fabulous hero, Fancy Mostacho, will need to run and climb towards each complication and solve it. Otherwise the trip will end up in misfortune.

This game was initially developed for the Global Game Jam of 2020 in Bogotá by the team BuhoDev. This version contains some after-jam polish.

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/fancy-misfortune-5
